entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:20 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cobourg 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -8.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -9.7°C
Wind: W 59 km/h gust 88 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Ontario early this morning. Local amount 10 cm in snow squalls. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
